segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 7
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 7

segments.pli: 6. Abyākatavagga
segments.en: 6. The Undeclared Points

segments.pli: 57. Sīhasenāpatisutta
segments.en: 57. General Sīha

segments.pli: Evaṃ me sutaṃ—
segments.en: So I have heard.

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.

segments.pli: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sīho senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then General Sīha went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:

segments.pli: “sakkā nu kho, bhante, sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ paññāpetun”ti?
segments.en: “Sir, can you point out a fruit of giving that’s apparent in the present life?”

segments.pli: “Tena hi, sīha, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya tathā naṃ byākareyyāsi.
segments.en: “Well then, Sīha, I’ll ask you about this in return, and you can answer as you like.

segments.pli: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha,
segments.en: What do you think, Sīha?

segments.pli: idha dve purisā—
segments.en: Consider two people.

segments.pli: eko puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, eko puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato.
segments.en: One is faithless, stingy, miserly, and abusive. One is a faithful donor who loves charity.

segments.pli: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, kaṃ nu kho arahanto paṭhamaṃ anukampantā anukampeyyuṃ:
segments.en: Which do you think the perfected ones will show compassion for first?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?
“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kintaṃ arahanto paṭhamaṃ anukampantā anukampissanti.
segments.en: “Why would the perfected ones first show compassion for the person who is faithless, stingy, miserly, and abusive?

segments.pli: Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato taṃyeva arahanto paṭhamaṃ anukampantā anukampeyyuṃ”. (1)
segments.en: They’d show compassion first for the faithful donor who loves charity.”

segments.pli: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, kaṃ nu kho arahanto paṭhamaṃ upasaṅkamantā upasaṅkameyyuṃ:
segments.en: “Which do you think the perfected ones will first approach?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?
“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kintaṃ arahanto paṭhamaṃ upasaṅkamantā upasaṅkamissanti.
Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato taṃyeva arahanto paṭhamaṃ upasaṅkamantā upasaṅkameyyuṃ”. (2)
segments.en: “They’d first approach the faithful donor who loves charity.”

segments.pli: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, kassa nu kho arahanto paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā paṭiggaṇheyyuṃ:
segments.en: “Which do you think the perfected ones will receive alms from first?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?
“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kintaṃ tassa arahanto paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā paṭiggaṇhissanti.
Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato tasseva arahanto paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā paṭiggaṇheyyuṃ”. (3)
segments.en: “They’d receive alms first from the faithful donor who loves charity.”

segments.pli: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, kassa nu kho arahanto paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desentā deseyyuṃ:
segments.en: “Which do you think the perfected ones will teach the Dhamma to first?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?
“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kintaṃ tassa arahanto paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desentā desessanti.
Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato tasseva arahanto paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desentā deseyyuṃ”. (4)
segments.en: “They’d first teach the Dhamma to the faithful donor who loves charity.”

segments.pli: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, kassa nu kho kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggaccheyya:
segments.en: “Which do you think would get a good reputation?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?
“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kintaṃ tassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchissati.
Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato tasseva kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggaccheyya”. (5)
segments.en: “The faithful donor who loves charity would get a good reputation.”

segments.pli: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, ko nu kho yaṃyadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkameyya, yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ visārado upasaṅkameyya amaṅkubhūto:
segments.en: “Which do you think would enter any kind of assembly bold and assured, whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?

“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kiṃ so yaṃyadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamissati, yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ visārado upasaṅkamissati amaṅkubhūto.
segments.en: “The faithful donor who loves charity would enter any kind of assembly bold and assured, whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.”

segments.pli: Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato so yaṃyadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkameyya, yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ visārado upasaṅkameyya amaṅkubhūto”. (6)
“Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, sīha, ko nu kho kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya:
segments.en: “When their body breaks up, after death, which do you think would be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”

segments.pli: ‘yo vā so puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, yo vā so puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato’”ti?
“Yo so, bhante, puriso assaddho maccharī kadariyo paribhāsako, kiṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissati.
segments.en: “Why would the person who is faithless, stingy, miserly, and abusive be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?

segments.pli: Yo ca kho so, bhante, puriso saddho dānapati anuppadānarato so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyya. (7)
segments.en: The faithful donor who loves charity would, when their body breaks up, after death, be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā sandiṭṭhikāni dānaphalāni akkhātāni, nāhaṃ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi.
segments.en: When it comes to these fruits of giving that are apparent in the present life, I don’t have to rely on faith in the Buddha,

segments.pli: Ahampi etāni jānāmi.
segments.en: for I know them too.

segments.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati, maṃ arahanto paṭhamaṃ anukampantā anukampanti.
segments.en: I’m a giver, a donor, and the perfected ones show compassion for me first.

segments.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati, maṃ arahanto paṭhamaṃ upasaṅkamantā upasaṅkamanti.
segments.en: I’m a giver, and the perfected ones approach me first.

segments.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati, mayhaṃ arahanto paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā paṭiggaṇhanti.
segments.en: I’m a giver, and the perfected ones receive alms from me first.

segments.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati, mayhaṃ arahanto paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desentā desenti.
segments.en: I’m a giver, and the perfected ones teach me Dhamma first.

segments.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati, mayhaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
segments.en: I’m a giver, and I have this good reputation:

segments.pli: ‘sīho senāpati dāyako kārako saṅghupaṭṭhāko’ti.
segments.en: ‘General Sīha gives, serves, and attends on the Saṅgha.’

segments.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati yaṃyadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamāmi, yadi khattiyaparisaṃ … pe … yadi samaṇaparisaṃ visārado upasaṅkamāmi amaṅkubhūto.
segments.en: I’m a giver, I enter any kind of assembly bold and assured, whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.

segments.pli: Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā sandiṭṭhikāni dānaphalāni akkhātāni, nāhaṃ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi.
segments.en: When it comes to these fruits of giving that are apparent in the present life, I don’t have to rely on faith in the Buddha,

segments.pli: Ahampi etāni jānāmi.
segments.en: for I know them too.

segments.pli: Yañca kho maṃ, bhante, bhagavā evamāha:
segments.en: But when the Buddha says:

segments.pli: ‘dāyako, sīha, dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī’ti.
segments.en: ‘When a giver’s body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.’ I don’t know this,

segments.pli: Etāhaṃ na jānāmi, ettha ca panāhaṃ, bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī”ti.
segments.en: so I have to rely on faith in the Buddha.”

segments.pli: “Evametaṃ, sīha, evametaṃ, sīha.
segments.en: “That’s so true, Sīha! That’s so true!

segments.pli: Dāyako, sīha, dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”ti.
segments.en: When a giver’s body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha explains the benefits of giving that are visible in the present life, and one that is only apparent in the next.
